tags: None
review: It was accidentally we came across Dr Aparna after reading on Practo and after a not so pleasant experience with a senior renowned doctor. But this was the best decision as Doctor Aparna was truly professional and more than that so friendly. My wife could instantly connect and everytime we consulted,we were assured of the best advise with a friendly smile. She took all the care throughout and finally we were blessed with a healthy baby boy. Even post delivery we are seeking her advise and the experience all throughout the past 5 months has been fantastic. A definite recommendation for anyone looking for the **** doctor with a personal and professional experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I came across this wonderful strong blessing in disguise Doctor Ms.Aparna Muddana.Not only she made my hyper tensed self feel okey by explaining the entire problem with ease, so much so to make it not look like a problem at all.I instantly connected with her as she helped me day in and day out with all my issues that were going on in my troublesome young mind.Her treatment is one of its kind and anyone will be fully satisfied.I am so fond of her...Thank you god we still have doctors like her who care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We came across Dr. Aparna basis the positive reviews on Practo and found them absolutely correct practically. Words are less to describe qualities of Dr Aparna. *** ** ** ****** ** *** *****, very humble and friendly with patient, calm and full of patience to listen to every query, full of energy even at 2 AM visit, makes patient very comfortable to talk and heal. *** **** **** ****** ** **** **** ****. Even 5 Stars are less for her as a rating!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr. Aparna is truly a Blessing in Disguise..  She is wonderful Soul .. The way she talks and treats her patient is so calm and relaxing...she makes u feel so comfortable..   Her Way of explaining, treatment Behaviour is just so Awesome..  I can't thank u enough .... May u Rise and Shine...  

I Don't regret u choosing over other gynaecologist I am Really thankful to Dr. Rhianna for  suggesting me talented Doctor like you...  God bless you

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Value for money,
review: The doctor is really polite and friendly. She explains the problem along with the medical terms with a lot of patience. I visited her today, at a time when the corona virus pandemic is all around me, still I felt safe inside the hospital, La Femme Fortis. The entire experience was quite smooth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have visited at Triton hospital for my wife delivery 
3 month back.  Before this I don't know the name of Dr Aparna Muddana. We Just consult to Dr Aparna first time with my wife and we were very much satisfied with Doctor consultation her way explained the situation and her friendly behaviour.
Dr is very fully dadicated towards her duty and main things I like the confidence she build to patient.
So finally we Blessed with baby boy last month with Normal delivery procedure under the supervision of Dr Aparna Muddana with Affordable treatment cost.
I Highly recommend to Dr Aparna Muddana and 
respect this type of doctor from bottom of my heart.
My Good wishes to her...God blessüôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Words are less to describe the personality of doctor Aparna. Completely satisfied with the outcome of the treatment. She is like blessings in disguise for us. Thank you so much ma'am.

tags: None
review: A very concerned doctor. she will treat you as a family member, her suggestions are beneficial. Will surely recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She is a very friendly lady and a very good doctor..Her way of explanation was really very nice and I would highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Aparna is very friendly and very clear in her explanation She always insisted for normal delivery instead of surgery from the first day we met her
You can call her at any time even @ 2am and she will be available
Thank you so much Dr Aparna
From my side the rating is 5 out of 5 and will recommend all to atleast check once with her before delivery and even from 1st day after knowing your pregnancy
Regards
Ruma Jana
Patient from Triton Hospital
